name: A DIS_ABLED REVOLUTIONARIES WAITING FOR THE DOWNFALL OF CAPITALISM MANIFESTO
name_original: A DIS_ABLED REVOLUTIONARIES WAITING FOR THE DOWNFALL OF CAPITALISM MANIFESTO
description:
A DIS_ABLED REVOLUTIONARIES WAITING FOR THE DOWNFALL OF CAPITALISM MANIFESTO

...is a little 3d dis_ability affirming manifesto that i created within the last 2 days of 2022. click to flip the virtual page/change the camera angle and display the next text.

full-screen mode is recommended. downloadable files are provided as well.

(initially i wrote this text for trying out the electric zine maker, but this application unfortunately didn't seem to work under windows 11 - that's why it hasn't the form of a "classical book"/zine, which is actually even better in my opinion!!! ...also: slay in 2023!)
